text:
@DrKarlynB @Salon Salon is out of their freaking, leftist, Trump hating tiny little remnants of their minds!
I feel sorry for poor dementia addled @JoeBiden but can you just imagine him dealing with the coronavirus, which he probably thinks has something to do with contaminated beer?
